alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Madison; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 16 at 4:27PM EDT until August 16 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... North central Taylor County in Big Bend of Florida... Southwestern Madison County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 427 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Monticello, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Iddo, Ebb, Lamont, Waukeenah, Capps, Wacissa, Eridu, Nash, Sirmans and Thomas City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
